82673.summary: Some customers in the Charleswood & Betsworth area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
82673.title: Sept 1 - Winnipeg (Charleswood & Betsworth) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

82703.summary: Some customers in the Kildonan crossing and Peguis area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
82703.title: Sept 2 - Winnipeg (Kildonan crossing and Peguis) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
